useCase.name: Use Case: User interacts to SignIn Up on Accept Button click

mainSequence.step: User clicks on the Accept Button triggering an ActionEvent.
HelloController creates a new Bankomat instance.
Bankomat is initialized with the selected bank, location, and starting balance of 100000.0 implemented by HelloController.
HelloController adds a new UserAdmin named "admin" linked to the bankomat with the PIN 5555.
HelloController passes the bankomat instance to SignIn_UpController for interaction.
SignIn_UpController is shown to the user, interacting with bankomat object.
HelloController completes this process by closing the interaction.
